description.value: Dispensing Contractors and Nomination. As per current processes, a patient may require prescribed items to be authorised across different prescriptions to allow for dispensing by different dispensing contractors. Question? Should this move to Medication.performerType?

purpose.value: Dispensing Contractors and Nomination. As per current processes, a patient may require prescribed items to be authorised across different prescriptions to allow for dispensing by different dispensing contractors. Question? Should this move to Medication.performerType?
